caption:
Ever wondered how to correctly recycle your Evolve Organic Beauty products? Here’s how:

🫗Glass bottles & jars – Rinse & recycle in your local glass bin
🎋 Sugarcane-derived tubes – Curbside recyclable! Just cut them open, rinse, and place in your recycling bin
🌊Prevented Ocean Plastic bottles – Recyclable & planet-friendly
🚿NEW Pulpex Shower Refills - Rinse and recycle with your paper and card waste

By making simple swaps and recycling correctly, we can all take steps toward a more circular beauty industry ♻️

🔗 Learn more about our sustainability efforts via the link in bio.
